snippet: George Zimmerman, the Florida neighborhood watch volunteer who was cleared of charges in the shooting death of Trayvon Martin, was said to have threatened his wife and his father-in-law.
abstract: George Zimmerman, Florida man acquitted in shooting death of Trayvon Martin, is questioned by police after his wife Shellie reported that he punched her father and threatened them both with a gun; they declined to press charges.
lead_paragraph: George Zimmerman, the Florida neighborhood watch volunteer who was cleared of charges in the shooting death of Trayvon Martin, was said to have threatened his wife and his father-in-law.

headline.main: Police Question Zimmerman About a Domestic Dispute
headline.print_headline: Police Question Zimmerman About a Domestic Dispute
